the three Swedish dominions Estonia, Livonia, and Ingria as well as parts of
Kexholm and Viborg. Prussia gained parts of Swedish Pomerania. Hanover gained Bremen-Verden. Holstein-Gottorp lost its part of the
Duchy of Schleswig to Denmark.
